Entries.Fri4: Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#I'm not ashamed to say that I love my Grandma!#$e#Now Grand{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Pa:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.winter_Tue: Hey, can you go find {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} and tell her I said 'hi'?
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?$l#$b#If you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}, tell her I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley: I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.$9
Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}. Why does {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? Cool.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you have a swimsuit?^*sigh*... I wish there were more boys in this town, know what I mean?$s
Entries.Wed: Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#If you weren't a boy I'd ask you to play catch.^I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a girl like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so popular with the boys, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a sales{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, can I ask you something?^Hey, I want to ask you something.#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#What do you think about my haircut?^Do you think the boys like my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth.

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}.#$e#I'll see you around.

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}!
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Masculine:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}... Sorry.$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Daddy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}.
Entries.fall_26: I hope my grandparents are doing okay. Grand{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Pa:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}'s too cheap to turn on the furnace until the last minute.

Entries.OneKid_3: It was painful when i was pregnant.^I wonder what it's like to be pregnant...?$h

Entries.Sun.000: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}} is completely engrossed in the game. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} doesn't notice your presence.
